TopicTitle: When do you get the 'climb up' prompt?

Articles.Content:
I don't get the option to climb here.  

Is it only for specific parts?  Even using the ladder I don't get an option to climb up onto the platform.  Its a little frustrating.

I don't think it looks for specific parts. I think it looks for any solid object within a certain space above and in front of the kerbal, and in fact it often misses what you would expect to be a good platform. In this case I would simply press jump and then mash the climb button. Usually does the trick.
I’m not sure that grip strips are climbable, but just jump and the structural plates should let you climb on them.
